definitions.definition: used as a greeting when you meet somebody, in an email, when you answer the phone or when you want to attract somebody’s attention

examples.text: They exchanged hullos *(= said hullo to each other)* and forced smiles.

definitions.definition: used to show that you are surprised by something

examples.text: Hullo, hullo, what's going on here?

definitions.definition: used to show that you think somebody has said something stupid or is not paying attention

examples.text: Hullo? You didn't really mean that, did you?
I'm like, ‘Hullo! Did you even listen?’
